short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension detects and highlights key words in a Terms of Service. TosChecker is proudly brought to you by Dotcom Technologies.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you fed up of having to pretend that you've read a website's Terms and Conditions? ToSChecker takes away the hassle of having to read the lengthy Terms and Conditions. Once you get onto a page where you need to agree to the Terms and Conditions, you can simply click the extension and it will tell you all about the high priority words in the Terms and Conditions that you're viewing. You can even use the arrows to scroll through each high priority word.


ToSChecker is an innovative way to reduce people getting scammed or badly affected from not reading a companies terms.

ToSChecker is a product of Dotcom Technologies, a UK based technology startup that focuses on mobile applications, chrome extensions and websites.

You can view the ToSChecker website here: http://toschecker.com

You can view Dotcom Technologies website here: http://dotcomtechltd.com
